# get() - Methods
Get a music from YouTube Music by URL or ID or search query (Warning: search query length must be different from 11 characters)

---
**Builder**:
````javascript
get(query)
````

### Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Description | Optional |
| :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: |
| query | [string![Link](/yt_music_api/assets/img/external_link.svg)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) | ex: "Hello Adele" or "https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=abc" or "abc" | <h1 style="color: darkred">êÑÇ</h1> |
